LanguageData.setting_doctorRescueColonist_desc: Doctors will rescue allied colonists before rescuing animals or outsiders.
LanguageData.setting_doctorTreatColonist_desc: Doctors will treat colonist injuries before treating animals or outsiders.
LanguageData.setting_haulRottables_desc: Haulers will haul rottable items (corn, meals etc.) before generic things.
LanguageData.setting_haulDeterioratables_desc: Haulers will haul items which deteriorate over time (weapons, wood etc.) before generic things.
